channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #ja @ 1452832373796524034
item.description: (10/22up)PLATEAUウェブサイトに「Open Data」を追加しました。これまでPLATEAUで整備した全国の3D都市モデルのオープンデータをリスト化し、DLサイトにアクセス可能です。多様な領域での積極的な活用を期待しています。 https://t.co/snGejHxtMR https://t.co/Gd0zdjysM3

item.title: #en @ 1452812761403207680
item.description:
No part of atlanta is in cobb county.
I’ve seen ppl claiming that it is lately on this stupid website. Idk how this myth gets started.
Atlanta is mainly in fulton and Part in dekalb.
I invite you to inspect atlantas own map of its boundaries #ATL
https://t.co/11KkDHeht2

item.title: #en @ 1452806915151605762
item.description:
Just released RapiD v1.1.8 including several performance improvements and bugfixes. Bringing open data into @openstreetmap has never been easier! 🪄 Edit OSM today at: https://t.co/RXDE3k3Pcv
Changelog: https://t.co/zcD5PrZOB0 https://t.co/CVS0pfRd9N

item.title: #en @ 1452780735232987138
item.description:
My Financial Transparency Act just passed the House!
The bill will lead to more transparent and open data sources and data that is readily comparable across businesses and sectors.
This is a win-win for regulators, for investors, for accuracy, and for financial stability. https://t.co/9KZ6wGKqEI

item.description:
Building a full-stack application can be daunting. 😱 But it’s not as hard as you might think to get the basics up and running.
@eddiejaoude shows you how to do it in less than an hour with NuxtJS, NestJS, and #Datastax Astra DB: https://t.co/dsiAp92aVk #AppDev

item.title: #pt @ 1452693385479954436
item.description: Essa é a última semana do hacktoberfest da gente 🥺🤧 Mas conteúdo não falta, viu? Teremos o minicurso "Computadores que enxergam" com @ddt_azevedo , a palestra sobre dados abertos com @na_emys e @U_Dorii e a palestra sobre a influência da temperatura no funcionamento do PC!

item.description:

Come si contano le dosi residue? https://t.co/6r3UKXk5Rm

item.title: #en @ 1452621646062395397
item.description:
This is an incredibly important topic that is too often overlooked.
You can’t have open science without open data.
You can’t have open data without anonymization.
And you can’t have anonymization without a clean and structured way to remove the face from structural MRI data. https://t.co/d26lqgEGyU

item.title: #en @ 1452619465837973508
item.description: Congrats to the amazing Leiden Consortium Individual Development researchers who are celebrating completion of 8 years of data collection: 990 participants; 2 cohorts; 6 longitudinal waves; ages 3-14-yrs; 1400 MRI scans. Open data in development. Stay tuned! #LeidenCID https://t.co/O0HNFOAX7j

item.title: #en @ 1452618897757179914
item.description: @embl @ELIXIREurope The report covers EMBL-EBI managed data resources, but #opendata is a community movement. We thank all our partners & collaborators for their contribution, our funders for their continued support, and our users for choosing #opendata. Let’s keep the data flowing! 🙏

item.title: #de @ 1452598778708598786
item.description: Unser Online-Portal gehört nicht nur zur #IKMK-Familie, sondern auch zu #museumdigital, das über 800 Museen mit etwa 800'000 Objekten umfasst und ebenfalls mit Linked Open Data arbeitet. Wir sind dort das erste Schweizer Museum überhaupt(!): https://t.co/EoXKaRDNBH Check it out!

item.title: #en @ 1452552685417373702
item.description:
I am taking part in two sessions at the #ODISummit2021 next week.
Who can make open data portals work for more people? & Disinformed and Misinforming: Is data the problem or the cure?
(Spoilers. I will wave my arms about and mention The Web)
Book now https://t.co/xMFlmFYjWY https://t.co/ZtQhWrEzNq

item.title: #en @ 1452549737283002372
item.description: Hi EEG tweeps, looking for a dataset to do some preprocessing comparisons. We have some things that need to be fulfilled 1⃣Raw EEG Recordings(> 20 participants) 2⃣2+ separable within-subject conditions 3⃣Annotations from manual cleaning Any ideas? @AcademicEEG #EEG #OpenData

item.title: #en @ 1452521317987667969
item.description: Did you know that while you vote on two separate ballots, the ballots are not (only) counted separately? Your ward vote for a party member who does not win the ward, gets taken in towards PR seats calculations for that party… learn this & more… https://t.co/C7OEC6AUKa

item.title: #de @ 1452265256550535179
item.description: Als Bürger dieses Landes soll ich mich an Gesetze halten. Danach suchen darf ich in der "Bürgerversion" des Bundesgesetzblattes allerdings leider nicht. Staat in Version 1.0 schlägt wieder zu. Möge die #Ampel daran etwas ändern! #opendata #openaccess https://t.co/lydd18FPVa

item.title: #es @ 1452247897140080641
item.description: El fracaso del sector público para utilizar métodos creativos de resolución de problemas que aprovechen la inteligencia colectiva y los datos abiertos es generalizado.

item.title: #en @ 1452236463760936964
item.description:
To me, #opendata is a two-way street.
When all the data (by date of report, date of death, and even the anonymised individual-level data) is accessible in raw format AND graphically on COVIDNOW, press and politicians have a duty to be rigorous before shooting their mouths off.

item.title: #es @ 1452114530906038272
item.description: En la actualización de datos abiertos de hoy en MX se sigue observando un descenso en casos activos. A nivel estatal, tres entidades tienen aumentos; una de ellas (BC) tiene 80% más casos activos que en el pico de la ola previa. https://t.co/M3Uf5mXTOq

item.title: #en @ 1451864852042063872
item.description:
#DYK about #Copernicus satellites?
Suspended particulate matter (SPM) is often abundant in coastal waters
▶️#Sentinel2 🇪🇺🛰️delivers high-resolution #OpenData which can be used to develop innovative models of these transitional areas
⬇️Image of the Adriatic Coast on 19 October https://t.co/VyKitbQgLj

item.title: #en @ 1451647665008173063
item.description: @RWMaloneMD Opendata, Opensciences, FAIRdata and datasharing is only possible if the quality and integrity of the data is well guaranteed. Biggest danger for AI application is manipulated datasets.

item.title: #en @ 1451640808021581826
item.description: Today, we launched the new Open Data Science curriculum at the Wellcome Trust DTC for Public Health, Economics & Decision Science @ScHARRSheffield. It will not only cover open science principles, but also teach some practical 21st century research skills: using Github, R, etc 🎉 https://t.co/WOM426rQzF
